LanguageData.MakeAmmo_DroneHowitzerShell_HE.label: Make an attack drone x3
LanguageData.MakeAmmo_DroneHowitzerShell_HE.descripti: Make a radio-controlled drone from scrap materials.
LanguageData.MakeAmmo_DroneHowitzerShell_HE.jobString: Creates a set of attack drones.
LanguageData.MakeAmmo_DroneHowitzerShell_EMI.label: Make a drone radio jammer x3
LanguageData.MakeAmmo_DroneHowitzerShell_EMI.descript: Make a radio-controlled drone from scrap materials to deliver radio control equipment.
LanguageData.MakeAmmo_DroneHowitzerShell_EMI.jobStrin: Creates a set of suppressive drones.
LanguageData.MakeAmmo_DroneHowitzerShell_GRAN.label: Make a drone with a grenade suspension x3
LanguageData.MakeAmmo_DroneHowitzerShell_GRAN.descrip: Make a radio-controlled drone from scrap materials.
LanguageData.MakeAmmo_DroneHowitzerShell_GRAN.jobStri: Creates a set of gimbaled attack drones.
LanguageData.MakeAmmo_DroneHowitzerShell_MIN.label: Make an attack drone "Fury"
LanguageData.MakeAmmo_DroneHowitzerShell_MIN.descript: Make a radio-controlled drone from scrap materials.
LanguageData.MakeAmmo_DroneHowitzerShell_MIN.jobStrin: Creates a set of attack drones.
LanguageData.MakeAmmo_EngineDrone.label: Make an engine for a drone
LanguageData.MakeAmmo_EngineDrone.description: Make a Mini ICE (ICE - Internal Combustion Engine) is a small internal combustion engine designed for use in small machines, devices or for specific tasks. Mini internal combustion engines typically have a smaller displacement and lower power compared to internal combustion engines used in drones.
